page.title: 16SCHOOL EVENTS IN COLEHILL
page.content: These are some of the annual events we have at school.Soon we will be having Sports Day. I will run in the running race.I like the Christmas events.We have a Christmas party and lots to eat and drink.Most years we have a sponsored walk.Last year I did not go. All it is is just walking around the school grounds.We raised a lot of money.Every year we have a school photograph.I have mine taken with my sister.The dentist comes to check up on our teeth.My teeth were all right. The library van comes every term and people go and choose some books.We have an annual outing.We are going soon to the Motor Museum at Beaulieu. DEBORAH HARVEY aged 9 yrs.
